title: Instant Feedback system is now live on OCE

embed.description: Instant Feedback system is now live on OCE in #LeagueOfLegends

replies.body: I've noticed a way lower level of toxicity today already in my games.

reds have confirmed, they have also plastered it in the client.

pretty sure its confirmed.
Somehow i doubt anyone is actually taking bans off this, because there would be some bitching on the boards by now otherwise.
Can someone explain how this new system works to me?  The riot post was super unclear. Is there a bot monitoring the reports or humans?
